column1: Mass of Christian Burial will be at 10:30 a.m. on Friday
column3: 2015 at the Holy Trinity Catholic Church in Hettinger. Fr. Stephan Folorunso will celebrate the Mass with burial to follow in the Hettinger Cemetery. There will be a Rosary and Vigil service for Stanley on Thursday
column5: 2015 at the Holy Trinity Catholic Church beginning at 6:30 p.m. Visitation will be on Thursday
column7: 2015 from 3:00 p.m. until the Rosary at the Holy Trinity Catholic Church.
